// firebase cloud messaging 007 notification_key
// Intro activity Intro Today\'s Meals Meal Plans Shopping List Consultation Sessions Your Thoughts Matter Navigation bar Meals planned for the day are located here, clicking on a meal will view its cooking instruction. A meal can be marked as eaten and logged to your record or as prepped for later if you\'re preparing your meals in advance Your shopping list with only the shopping items you need for your meal plan. You can browse your previous and future meal plans from here. Schedule your consultation sessions and enter them from here when its time to meet your nutritionists. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, feel free to write to us anytime and we will be in touch shortly You can navigate through the app using the navigation drawer on the left side
status Error retrieving token Log Out Camera and Microphone permissions needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality. Settings "You're connected" "Reconnecting..."
Set your preferred audio and video codec. Not all codecs are supported with Group rooms. The media server will fallback to OPUS or VP8 if a preferred codec is not supported. Audio Codec Video Codec Set sender bandwidth constraints. Zero represents the WebRTC default value which varies by codec. Max Audio Bitrate (bits per second) Max Video Bitrate (bits per second) Speaker ON VP8 Simulcast
